{{wiktionary|Dylan}} '''Dylan''' may refer to: {{TOC right}} ==Arts and entertainment== * [[Dylan (play)|''Dylan'' (play)]], a 1964 play by Sidney Michaels * [[Bob Dylan]] (born 1941), American singer and songwriter ** [[Dylan (1973 album)|''Dylan'' (1973 album)]], a 1973 album by Bob Dylan ** [[Dylan (2007 album)|''Dylan'' (2007 album)]], a 2007 compilation album by Bob Dylan * Dylan (born 2002), South Korean rapper and member of [[D-Crunch]]
==Technology and engineering== * [[Dylan (programming language)]], a language with Lisp-like semantics and ALGOL-like syntax * Dylan, a RAID storage system by [[Quantel]] * Honda Dylan, a high-end [[List of Honda motorcycles#125cc|125cc Honda scooter]] in Vietnam
==Other uses== * [[Dylan (name)]], a given name and a family name (including a list of persons with the name)<!--used as an example in [[WP:MOSDAB]]--> ** [[Dylan Thomas]] (1914â€“1953), Welsh poet * [[Dylan ail Don]], a sea-god in Celtic mythology
==See also== * [[Dillon (disambiguation)]] * [[Dilyn]], a dog * [[Dilyn (drug)]], an expectorant
{{disambiguation}}
